postCreateCommand:
bash -lc '
PY=/usr/local/bin/python;
$PY -m pip install -U pip && \
$PY -m pip install ipykernel && \
$PY -m pip install -e ".[dev]" && \
# register kernel using this exact interpreter
$PY -m ipykernel install --name=python3 --display-name="Python 3 (3.13)" --user && \
# patch the notebook to point to the python3 kernelspec (VS Code will bind to /usr/local/bin/python)
$PY - <<"PY"
import json, pathlib
p = pathlib.Path("notebooks/Quickstart.ipynb")
if p.exists():
    nb = json.loads(p.read_text(encoding="utf-8"))
    md = nb.setdefault("metadata", {})
    md["kernelspec"] = {
        "name": "python3",
        "display_name": "Python 3 (3.13)",
        "language": "python"
    }
    md["language_info"] = {"name": "python"}
    p.write_text(json.dumps(nb, ensure_ascii=False, indent=1), encoding="utf-8")
    print("Pinned kernelspec to python3 in", p)
else:
    print("Notebook not found:", p)
PY'
postAttachCommand: bash -lc 'if [ -f notebooks/Quickstart.ipynb ]; then code -r notebooks/Quickstart.ipynb; fi'
